name: Classic Oatmeal Cookies
description: Try personalizing this classic recipe with chocolate chips, coconut, raisins, diced dates or dehydrated apricots.
preparation: Whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and apple pie spice.
Cream butter, sugars and vanilla extract in a separate bowl. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Combine wet and dry ingredients. Stir in oats until well-combined. Fold in dried berries.
Drop dough by heaping teaspoonful 3” apart onto on a Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Lightly flatten cookies with the palm of your hand.
Bake for 10–12 min, or until lightly browned at edges.
